body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   News               Photos & Multimedia               History & Culture               Education               Kids & Youth               Management         Â    News Subscribe to park updates, find out more about our social media pages, and browse our press releases and archived news.   Photos & Multimedia Enjoy a virtual visit! Explore our photo collections, videos, and audio tours.   History & Culture Learn more about some of the people who shaped Salem and the historic landscapes, objects, and structures that compose Salem Maritime National Historic Site.   Education Make the park your classroom! Explore options for field trips and teacher workshops, and view curriculum materials to enhance students' experiences.  Kids & Youth Learn more about family activities scheduled at the site, download Junior Ranger program booklets, and discover activities to do at home!  Management Find out more about our administrative history and future, and how to get in touch with our management.
title: Salem Maritime National Historic Site: Learn About the Park
